data.title: A Site Generator Blindside
data.description: This is a good blindside to blind enemies pushing A Site or to get information on enemies peaking A Site.

data.title: A Screens to A Site Blindside
data.description: This is a good blindside to retake A Site or to assist your teammate on A Site during an execute from your enemy.

data.title: B Orange to Mid Blue Blindside
data.description: This is a good blindside to blind anyone pushing Mid Blue allowing you to get an early peak or to assist a teammate being pinned down in Mid Boiler.
